search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EmailOctopus (emailoctopus.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for EmailOctopus is available at: [https://emailoctopus.com/pricing](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing – EmailOctopus
===============

[](https://emailoctopus.com/)

*   [Why EmailOctopus?](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)
    
    [Features](https://emailoctopus.com/features) [Customers](https://emailoctopus.com/customers) [Savings calculator](https://emailoctopus.com/savings-calculator) [About us](https://emailoctopus.com/about-us) [How we give back](https://emailoctopus.com/doing-good)
    
*   [Pricing](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing)
*   [Resources](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)
    
    [Blog](https://blog.emailoctopus.com/) [Guide to email marketing](https://emailoctopus.com/guide-to-email-marketing) [Knowledge base](https://help.emailoctopus.com/)
    

*   [Sign in](https://emailoctopus.com/account/sign-in)
*   [Sign up](https://emailoctopus.com/account/sign-up?productType=core)

Pricing plans to suit you
=========================

Straightforward pricing that scales with your business.

Starter

Free

2,500 subscribers  
10,000 emails per month

*   EmailOctopus branding on emails
*   Reports available for 30 days
*   Create up to 3 landing pages and forms
*   Access for 1 user

[Get started for free](https://emailoctopus.com/account/sign-up)

###### Recommended

Pro

*   Full control over your email design
*   Reports available forever
*   Unlimited landing pages and forms
*   Add unlimited users
*   Cancel any time

Sign up [Contact us](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)

![Image 1: AWS logo](https://emailoctopus.com/build/images/sales/logos/aws-stacked.121a668d.png)

Looking for our Amazon SES product? Switch to [EmailOctopus Connect](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing-connect).

Integrations

Support

Email support

For first 30 days

Priority support

Charity or nonprofit?
---------------------

If you're a nonprofit, we want to support your mission – that's why all nonprofits using EmailOctopus get a 20% lifetime discount.

Custom plans
------------

If you've got more than 500,000 subscribers, contact us for a quote.

Automatic upgrades
------------------

No need to worry about adjusting your payment plans as your mailing list grows – we'll sort this for you automatically.

FAQs
----

### [Do you offer a free trial?](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)

Our Starter plan is free and lets you send campaigns to up to 2,500 subscribers. If you want to check we're the right service for you, we recommend signing up to this plan and upgrading once you've tried us out.

### [How long are your contracts?](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)

All our plans run on a month-to-month basis, meaning you can cancel any time. You pay upfront for a month, and once you've cancelled you'll continue to have access for the remainder of the month at which point you'll be downgraded and no further payments will be made.

### [What payment methods do you accept?](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)

We accept Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Diners Club and Discover cards.

### [What happens if I exceed my contact limit?](https://emailoctopus.com/pricing#)

If you hit your contact limit we'll automatically upgrade you to the next tier.

![Image 2: Camilla from Folksy](https://emailoctopus.com/build/images/sales/features/testimonial.73086617.jpg)

EmailOctopus offers all the essential features we need, is easy to use and great value for money.

Camilla Westergaard, Folksy

Start for free today
--------------------

Sign up and send your first campaign in minutes. No credit card required.

[Get started](https://emailoctopus.com/account/sign-up)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The Starter plan is free and allows up to 2,500 subscribers and 10,000 emails per month. The Pro plan offers additional features and scalability.
